articles.title: Heinrich Klaasen revels in replicating AB de Villiers' genius - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The dynamic South African star revealed how maturing in his game has aided his improvement as a batter.
articles.content: The dynamic South African star revealed how maturing in his game has aided his improvement as a batter.Klaasen played a scintillating knock to help South Africa equal the ODI series against Australia… [+1921 chars]
